parameters.name: TreatContactAsCollision
parameters.description: True to treat touching faces/edges/vertices as colliding, false to require solid bodies to overlap in a finite volume

title: ICollisionDetectionManager.IsCollisionPresent
description: Performs collision detection analysis between all groups of components.

parameters.name: TreatContactAsCollision
parameters.description: True to treat touching faces/edges/vertices as colliding, false to require solid bodies to overlap in a finite volume

returns: Return code as defined in swCollisionDetectionResults_e
remarks:
This method takes less time to run than
ICollisionDetectionManager::GetCollisions
.
